Selected Projects

Artificial Intelligence Agent

Developed anAI agent for 5x5 GO gamewhich defeats all kinds of player and the win rate is 95%. Used Alpha Beta pruning and minimax algorithm to develop this agent.


Neural Network

Implemented a Neural Network from scratch without using any libraries to detect handwritten MNIST dataset that resulted in 98.3% accuracy.


Weather Bot

Coded a telegram bot to add regions and sends weather alert at a particular time of a day.


IoT based Vertical Farming

Developed an automatic irrigation system using Internet of Things and sensors to reduce water usage in Vertical Farming.
